subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: No one has caught more games in a Boston Red Sox uniform than Jason Varitek, who should add to that total this season now that he has agreed to a one-year contract worth $5 million. The deal includes an option for 2010.
snippet: No one has caught more games in a Boston Red Sox uniform than Jason Varitek, who should add to that total this season now that he has agreed to a one-year contract worth $5 million. The deal includes an option for 2010.
